ValidationRule.description: By selecting outlet user also cannot have outlet pages in report
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL(Outlet_Option__c, 'Outlet') || ISPICKVAL(Outlet_Option__c, 'Full Price') ) && (includes( Report_Pages__c ,"Outlet Full Price") || includes( Report_Pages__c ,"Outlet Destinations") || includes( Report_Pages__c ,"Outlet Nationalities") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot select an Outlet Option and an Outlet specific page. Please remove the Outlet related pages from the selection, or change the Outlet Option to show all stores.
